action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Secure Airport Public Spaces Act of 2018
This bill allows airports to: (1) use passenger facility charge revenue for projects to enhance security of areas of an airport outside of areas screened by the Transportation Security Administration that are directly and substantially related to the movement of passengers and baggage, and (2) install security cameras in the public area of the interior and exterior of the airport terminal as part of the airport improvement program.
